description:
A female ace pilot who leads one of Neo Zeon`s mobile suit combat teams, flying a blue Geara Doga with a commander`s antenna. Not only is Rezin a threat to the Londo Bell`s ships and mobile suits, but she also harbors a deep hatred for her own Newtype allies, whether natural or artificial. This resentment, it`s said, is the mark of a confirmed "Oldtype."
Source: Official Site
name: Rezin Schnyder
